main event: An unidentified flying object was observed flying parallel to Jupiter in the southern sky near Hanksville, Utah on September 3, 1962.
interesting points: The object emitted red, green, and white lights at times., The object was initially thought to be Jupiter but was determined to be something else., The speed of the object was estimated to be around 600 mph., The sighting lasted for about 30 minutes., The object's metallic appearance was clearly visible.
witness description: Airline pilots from several flights observed the object.
